ovdesc.p: The LD.PAYMENT.ENTRY system provides the user with the ability to obtain details of all disbursements on loan contracts.
Input of manual payments via LD PAYMENT ENTRY is prohibited.
The update functions (e.g. INPUT) are not permitted for automatic payments.
One automatic payment entry may result in one, two or no physical payment messages.
1 physical payment message is produced if all payment instructions of all components are the same.
2 physical payment messages are produced if the principal payment instructions differ from the interest payment instruction.
No physical payment messages are produced if the customer of the Nostro account being credited is the same as the beneficiary customer. In this case the confirmation suffices.

Confirmation that payment entry details have been passed over (where necessary) to the T24 Delivery Module for onward communication to the counterparty.
